summary: The diff adds a new Privacy Policy page and registers a /privacy route, and wires the footer Privacy Policy button to navigate via the existing route-transition hook. However, the diff summary also indicates multiple unrelated site changes (landing/plans/products pages, route-transition hook behavior, branding/title updates, admin features), which conflicts with the request to keep the rest of the site intact and to not change global route-transition behavior beyond reusing it.

missing_requirements.requirement: No other existing pages or routes have their layouts/content changed as part of this work (except where necessary to add the new /privacy route).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates changes to multiple other pages/components beyond adding the /privacy page and route.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed features on LandingPage (e.g., UsersWorldwideKpi component and dynamic user count).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; the BuildRequest only asks to add /privacy and wire the footer link.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to AccessPlansPage behavior (clickable tier cards, event propagation fixes).
Changes to ProductsPage content (removed disclaimer text).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly asks to keep everything else intact aside from /privacy and footer wiring.

hallucinated_features.description: Branding/title update (document title changed from "Portalfxsign" to "TelsFX").
Changes to global route-transition implementation (timing/behavior, error handling, cleanup).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal states not to change existing global route-transition timing/behavior beyond reusing it for the footer Privacy Policy link.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin/user account viewing features and other unrelated project-state updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest forbids adding backend storage/APIs and focuses only on /privacy page + footer link.
